body_html: @ispirmustafa I agree with you about putting more resources to the first worker. But this issue, most of calculates except summaries and checkpoints are on worker1. Worker1 costs 1000% of cpu and other workers cost 30%~50%. When I set worker_device='/job:worker/task:%d' % self._config.task. Every worker cost 300%~500% of cpu.

body: @ispirmustafa I agree with you about putting more resources to the first worker. But this issue, most of calculates except summaries and checkpoints are on worker1. Worker1 costs 1000% of cpu and other workers cost 30%~50%. When I set `worker_device='/job:worker/task:%d' % self._config.task`. Every worker cost 300%~500% of cpu.
